Author: ghostsportclub
Text: To clarify bc I’ve talked about my bf, he’s genuinely my sunshine and the best fucking thing to ever happen to me. I don’t know what he sees in me :( he started dating me at my highest weight (like 125 or smth) and has always thought I’m the most beautiful girl in the world I FUCKING LOVE HIM he’s the best and he doesn’t know about this horrible disorder .. yet
